description:
Update: Oct 14th - I now earn over $10,000 per month publishing short romance books. That's net to me, not my total sales. It's the cash I actually receive in my hand! This course will show you how to get started writing your short romance books.

Why are some romance books impossible to put down, while others don’t get read past the fifth page?

Don’t believe anyone who tells you that it’s all about the author’s talent. Unless you’re a natural born genius of romance (which most of us aren’t), then good writing is only 10% talent, and 90% skill.

Our course is aimed to help you with that 90%.

These simple tips, tricks, and practical suggestions will help you excel in the most bestselling fiction genre in the world. The Love of Writing Romance is divided into seven lessons delivered in a conversational tone, each dealing with different elements of writing romance:

1. No Fear

The introductory lesson is about what may stand between you, the writer, and your work, how to overcome it, and offers some practical tips on increasing your productivity.

2. The Art of Plotting Romance

The second lessons contains accessible advice on how to lay out and plot your novels and stories.

3. Lovely Scenes, Sexy Sequels

Building on the second lesson, Lovely Scenes, Sexy Sequels is about how you can streamline your writing while making sure it remains engaging (and emotionally impactful) throughout.

4. Conflicts and the In-Between

Conflicts! Without them, most stories aren’t worth reading. The fourth lesson in our course talks about conflicts, and how to build them.

5. Characters Are People Too

There’s nothing worse for a romance story than characters your readers won’t care about. How can you make them engaging? This is what this lesson covers.

6. Erotica That Doesn't Suck

How to write erotica … that … doesn’t … suck. What more is there to add? Examples of good and bad erotic writing, what words to avoid, and how to make sure your sexy scenes stay that way.

7. 10 Points of Classy Romance

The last lesson in our course is a comprehensive summary of everything we’ve covered so far, and a few more tips for the future.

Take bold action now! Scroll up and click "Take This Course" and start learning how to write your first romance book. In a month or two you will be earning hundreds if not thousands of dollars passively each month!
title: How to Write Your First Romance Novel
